title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - March 12, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - March 12, 2022
description:
Mark and Gary link up to discuss a few stories in the news this weekend including Deshaun Watson and one of Mark's more illustrious former clients, enjoy!

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
